page.title: 07Employment in Escrick
page.content: The largest employer is the Woodard Corporation's Queen Margaret's School employing 75 female and 19 male staff (54 full time,40 part time). Escrick Park Estate employs 15 men and 1 female office worker - the work force having halved over the last 20 years. The Black Bull Inn employs 5 males and 10 female staff.An abbatoir has 13 staff.The Escrick medical practice has 2 doctors,2 district nurses and 3 receptionists.A land drainage contractor employs a work force of 20,and operates within a radius of 50 miles.The Post Office employs 6 and the general store has 2 working owners and 1 female emloyee.Other small businesses include a master saddler and a cabinet maker.Farming provides another source of employment in this rural community.
